verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G321>was<s%> led <S%G321>up<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to be <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G3571>nights,<s%> he <S%G3983>was<s%> <S%G3983>hungry<s%> <S%G5305>afterward.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3985>tempter<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> become <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2036>"It<s%> is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G444><s%> 'Man <S%G2198>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> that <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> <S%G1223>out<s%> of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G2736>down,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G3754>written,<s%> <S%G1781><s%> 'He will put <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> of <S%G4675>you.<s%>' <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G1909><s%> 'On their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they will <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G142>up,<s%> so <S%G3379>that<s%> you <S%G4350>don't<s%> dash <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone.<s%>'"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3825>"Again,<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1598><s%> 'You shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1598>test<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3880>to<s%> <S%G1519>an<s%> <S%G3029>exceedingly<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you will fall <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>"Get<s%> behind <S%G4567>me,<s%> Satan! <S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G4352><s%> 'You shall worship the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you shall <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3441>only.<s%>'"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G402>up,<s%> he withdrew <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

<S%G2641>Leaving<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2730>lived<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is by the <S%G3864>sea,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3508>Naphtali,<s%>
<S%G2443>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

"The <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3508>Naphtali,<s%> <S%G3598>toward<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> of the <S%G1093>Gentiles,<s%>

the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5457>light,<s%> to <S%G846>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5561>region<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> to them <S%G5457>light<s%> has <S%G393>dawned.<s%>"

<S%G575>From<s%> that <S%G5119>time,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>preach,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3340>"Repent!<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand.<s%>"

<S%G4043>Walking<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2424>he<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brothers:<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G231>fishermen.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1205>"Come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%> for <S%G444>men.<s%>"
<S%G863>They<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> their <S%G1350>nets<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>Going<s%> <S%G4260>on<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1350>nets.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
They <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>went<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of the <S%G932>Kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healing<s%> every disease <S%G2532>and<s%> every <S%G3554>sickness<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G189>report<s%> about <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>out<s%> into <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4947>Syria.<s%> They <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>who<s%> <S%G2560>were<s%> <S%G4912>sick,<s%> afflicted with <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G931>torments,<s%> possessed with <S%G1139>demons,<s%> <S%G4583>epileptics,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3885>paralytics;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Great <S%G4183>multitudes<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1179>Decapolis,<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
